member.name: M:CompilingMusic.Connect.setRandomSet
member.summary: Loads a random set file from the folder defined in settings and parses it into the global variable "currentSet".

member.name: M:CompilingMusic.Connect.loadSettings
member.summary: Parses CompilingMusicSettings.ini into the global variable "settings".

member.name: M:CompilingMusic.Connect.stopAndFree
member.summary: Frees the audio stream and BASS module to prevent memory leaks.

member.name: M:IniParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the INI file at the given path and enumerates the values in the IniParser.

member.name: M:IniParser.GetSetting(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value for the given section, key pair.

member.name: M:IniParser.EnumSection(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates all lines for given section.

member.name: M:IniParser.AddSetting(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds or replaces a setting to the table to be saved.

member.name: M:IniParser.AddSetting(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds or replaces a setting to the table to be saved with a null value.

member.name: M:IniParser.SaveSettings
member.summary: Save settings back to ini file.
